title: The Writer's Almanac for Monday, April 25, 2022
description: “Behind the screen of the ordinary can be found unique and wonderful things.” –Ted Kooser, poet, celebrating his 83rd birthday today.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: “Behind the screen of the ordinary can be found unique and wonderful things.” –Ted Kooser, poet, celebrating his 83rd birthday today.
